name: Untitled Magnet Based Survival Game
description:
You've just eaten a powerful electromagnet (in your defence it looked delicious) and now there's a massive magnetic wrecking ball hurtling towards you! Survive as long as you can.

Built for the Ebitengine Game Jam.

First time using this engine (and first time participating in a game jam), unfortunately didn't have enough time to dedicate to this project to put in everything I wanted. I'd like to add music, enemies that you need to direct the magnet at to kill, a dash power-up, and maybe a more defined goal like survive 5 minutes.
